name: liquid-voice
effect: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
